answers.answer: Y watch the weather lol I see a specialist tomorrow 2 for gestational diabetes. What are you going for?

I get anxious on scan days too. Usually I worry myself sick and end up with a migraine. Talk to your fiance about how you feel. It always helps me to get it out then have my bf reassure me that everything is fine.
